text: 5.17: Ais 43.18; Ro 8.1; 8.9-10; Ga 5.6; 6.15; Ef 2.15; VB 21.5Maaŋ muuŋgip, guma the Krais phorgɨp havhargirga, Fhe Bakɨme mba guman muuŋgirga, ana won ndava vura tɨvi thav, ana guman kama gegap, ana Fhe Bakɨmen tɨvi zɨn ŋgɨrga. Nde tuituigip khueŋ mbararari. Ntigem, ndava vura tɨvi za vhɨzgim, nza Fhe Bakɨme tɨvi zɨn vui.
